doc.name: AttributeMatcher
doc.description: A matcher to match any attribute. In the pattern of a ptolemy.actor.gt.TransformationRule, this matcher can be customized by instances of ptolemy.actor.gt.ingredients.criteria.Criterion. In the replacement of a ptolemy.actor.gt.TransformationRule, operations can be specified for this matcher with instances of ptolemy.actor.gt.ingredients.operations.Operation. The operations will be performed on the attribute that is matched by the corresponding matcher in the pattern, and is preserved after the transformation.
doc.author: Thomas Huining Feng
doc.property: The attribute containing all the criteria in a list (ptolemy.actor.gt.GTIngredientList).
The attribute containing all the operations in a list (ptolemy.actor.gt.GTIngredientList).
The attribute that specifies the name of the corresponding entity in the pattern.
